title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. III, pt. 221 - Civil Penalty: Criteria For Waiver Or Reduction Where Payment Is Made By A Prime Contractor Pursuant To Labor Law Section 223
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. III, pt. 221 - Civil Penalty: Criteria For Waiver Or Reduction Where Payment Is Made By A Prime Contractor Pursuant To Labor Law Section 223

State Regulations
§ 221.1 - Civil penalty

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. III, pt. 221

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§21, 220.8, 220-b.2, 223

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
